title: Drawing, "A Canopied Ceiling with Aurora in Central Panel", 1818–23
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over  traces of graphite on cream laid paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Canopy scheme. Ovoid medallion showing rising of sun in center. Motif is surrounded by festoons. An otherwise undecorated white tent or one with stripes and other decorations, especially pairs of puttos facing the corners. Pairs of putti and altar shown in the corners on blue ground. Moldings outside.
